土壤矿物质含量会影响人类生长和营养吗？研究人员研究了印度儿童和成年女性的土壤矿物质含量与健康状况之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Is-soil-mineral-content-impacting- human-growth-and-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Is-soil-mineral-content-impacting- human-growth-and-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67b4ccf4-6ae6-4646-beda-8c356859ab79 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:13:00 -0400 Is soil mineral content impacting human growth and nutrition?
男性和女性 COVID-19 患者对 IL-6 抑制治疗的免疫反应差异研究人员调查了抗白细胞介素 6 单克隆抗体是否与男性和女性 COVID-19 患者之间的异质治疗效果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-IL-6-inhibition-therapy- Between-male-and-female-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-IL-6-inhibition-therapy- Between-male-and-female-COVID-19-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=742f5bf2-d71b-4e74-bd29-6cf751c1ec45 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:05:00 -0400 Differences in immune responses to IL-6 inhibition therapy between male and female COVID-19 patients
用于预测阿尔茨海默病进展的最新神经影像程序和机器学习方法研究人员检查了最近的研究，探索先进机器学习 (ML) 算法辅助的神经影像模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/The-most-recent-neuroimaging-procedures-and-machine-learning-approaches-for-the-prediction-of-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/The-most-recent-neuroimaging-procedures-and-machine-learning-approaches-for-the-prediction-of-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c63d453-8f8a-4c73-8ad8-5e4490ebb68e Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:01:00 -0400 The most recent neuroimaging procedures and machine learning approaches for the prediction of Alzheimer’s progression

黑人怀孕带来的危险和死亡被视为“完全可以预防”的健康危机2017 年，当 Tonjanic Hill 得知自己怀孕 14 周时，她欣喜若狂。尽管有子宫肌瘤病史，但她从未失去对有一天会生孩子的信心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Dangers-and-deaths-around-Black-pregnancies-seen-as-a-e28098completely-preventablee28099-health-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Dangers-and-deaths-around-Black-pregnancies-seen-as-a-e28098completely-preventablee28099-health-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be61b85e-d949-461a-9828-65dc9feaf066 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 07:09:18 -0400 Dangers and deaths around Black pregnancies seen as a ‘completely preventable’ health crisis
研究表明 CD98hc 可以靶向在大脑中传递生物治疗药物研究人员设计并表征了一种针对异二聚氨基酸转运蛋白 CD98 重链的血脑屏障转运载体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Study-shows-that-CD98hc-can-be-targeted-to-deliver-biotherapeutics-in-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Study-shows-that-CD98hc-can-be-targeted-to-deliver-biotherapeutics-in-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87863217-f28f-4940-a0f8-e158cdb20ac9 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 06:47:00 -0400 Study shows that CD98hc can be targeted to deliver biotherapeutics in brain

沃特世推出用于基因治疗应用的 XBridge Premier GTx BEH SEC 色谱柱沃特世公司推出了全新尺寸排阻色谱 (SEC) 色谱柱系列中的第一款，旨在改进分析，同时降低基因治疗（特别是腺相关病毒 (AAV) 载体）的成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Waters-launches-XBridge-Premier-GTx-BEH-SEC-columns-for-gene-therapy-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Waters-launches-XBridge-Premier-GTx-BEH-SEC-columns-for-gene-therapy-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ead9a78f-d1a4-4cbd-a0d6-7705da05fba5 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 06:21:00 -0400 Waters launches XBridge Premier GTx BEH SEC columns for gene therapy applications
大型语言模型聊天机器人生成的眼科建议与眼科医生撰写的建议相比如何？一项研究声称，人工智能对患者眼部护理问题的回答质量与经过认证的眼科医生的回答质量相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/How-does-oducing-advice- generated-by-a-large-language-model-chatbot-compare-with-advice-writing-by-眼科医生。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/How-does-oducing-advice- generated-by-a-large-language-model-chatbot-compare-with-advice-writing-by-眼科医生。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff970010-08b2-4932-8de7-abad79a4599c Thu, 24 Aug 2023 05:55:00 -0400 How does ophthalmology advice generated by a large language model chatbot compare with advice written by ophthalmologists?
Complete Genomics 荣获著名的 2023 R&D 100 尖端创新奖加利福尼亚州圣何塞，2023 年 8 月 23 日 - 领先的基因组测序公司 Complete Genomics, Inc. 今天自豪地荣获《研发世界》杂志颁发的 R&D 100 大奖，该奖项通常被称为“创新奥斯卡”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Complete-Genomics-Garners-the-Prestigious-2023-RD-100-Awards-for-Cutting-Edge-Innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Complete-Genomics-Garners-the-Prestigious-2023-RD-100-Awards-for-Cutting-Edge-Innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60195b12-42d6-44c6-8221-398f89b34940 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 05:02:00 -0400 Complete Genomics Garners the Prestigious 2023 R&D 100 Awards for Cutting-Edge Innovation
